group_won_game.Description: subjects won at the face or the maze game at the end of the task sessions

sub_reach_n3.Description: If yes, subjects reach until N3 sleep in the MRI. So the bold session sleep includes W, N1, N2 and N3 sleep stages, If no, subject reach until N2 sleep in the MRI. So the sleep bold session includes W, N1 and N2 sleep stages

sex.Units: f for female, m for male

memory_face_game.Description: memory for the FACE game, performance for the placement of face according to the original location

memory_face_game_Z_score.Description: memory for the FACE game, Z-scored to allow comparision with the maze game

memory_maze_game.Description: memory for the MAZE game, performances measured as the shortest map distance from the participant�s current location after 30 s to the starting (here goal) point

memory_maze_game_Z_score.Description: memory for the MAZE game, Z-scored to allow comparision with the face game
